name: Always the Dreamer - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant, Original Mask Art
description:
Even when she's focused on the day to day, her dreamer is on duty laying the groundwork for other pursuits...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 3 3/4" high by 1 3/4" wide (95 mm x 44 mm) and is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.  The piece was made with stoneware clay and fired multiple times with layers of engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze and china paints.

name: Transcendental - Original Mask Art, Ceramic Wall Art, Mask Sculpture
description:
It isn't easy to rise above the fray, but it seems a worthy endeavor!  I like to keep a pair of mental wings handy for some of those pesky earthly moments...

This "one of a kind" stoneware mask sculpture measures 9" high by 4 1/2" wide by 1 3/4" deep and is ready to hang in a special place.  It was conceived and hand made entirely by yours truly!

Materials:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glazes, multifired, gold lustre, colored pencils

name: Roll Over - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant, Original Art
description:
When things seem to be heading south, I choose to roll over and see what's on the other side.  Who knows - it might add a little perspective...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 2 3/8" high by 1 3/8" wide (60 mm x 34 mm).  It has been made with stoneware clay and fired multiple times with layers of engobes, stains, underglaze pencils and a semi-matte glaze.  There are more trips to the kiln for the china painting and gold luster.

Finally, she is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

name: Reign-y Day Muse - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant, Original Mask Art
description:
She's the "go to" muse when a shot of confidence is needed.  In a line up of personal inspirations, she is right on top...

This little muse measures 3 3/8" high by 2 1/8" wide (86 mm x 54 mm) and is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.  She is sculpted with stoneware clay and fired multiple times with layers of engobes, stains, glazes, china paints and white gold lustre.  I've done a bit of finishing on the centers of the faces with colored pencils and matte varnish.

name: Full Circle - Ceramic Mask Sculpture, Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
What goes around, comes around.  The laws of nature can be both kind and cruel - but free will is also a force to be reckoned with...

This small "smoke fired" mask measures 2 3/4" high by 2 1/2" wide (70 mm x 64 mm).  It is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.  I made the piece with stoneware clay and it was fired multiple times with engobes and glazes.  The final firing was a modified raku firing:  fired in the kiln to china paint temperature (1330 degrees), removed when red hot and put into a bin with newspaper to smoke.  This gave the gold luster a lovely burnished look.

name: Oh, Deer - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant
description:
She's either right on target or she's fallen off the deep end.  I guess it depends on whether you've got her in your sights...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 3" high by 1 7/8" wide (76 mm x 48 mm).  It is made of stoneware clay and fired multiple times with engobes, stains, underglaze pencils and glazes.  I've then highlighted the piece with china paints and gold lustre.  "Oh, Deer" is an original, one of a kind piece - it is ready to wear as a pendant or to display

name: Advocate of the Arcane - Raku Ceramic Mask, Clay Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
No bells or whistles here.  She has quietly placed herself in the realm of the mystical and trusts in the Fates...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 3 7/8" high by 1 3/4" wide (98 mm x 44 mm) and is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

The piece was sculpted with stoneware clay and fired multiple times with layers of engobes, stains, glaze, china paints and 24 karat gold lustre.  I did a final firing in the raku kiln and finished my little advocate with a bit of colored pencil work in the eye area.

name: The Olive Branch - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant
description:
It's a gift from the hand, the heart and the soul.  Make of this what you will - just know that some of us will continue to offer them...

This small piece of original art measures 2 7/8" high by 2" wide (74 mm x 52 mm).  It has been sculpted of stoneware clay and multifired with layers of engobes, stains, underglaze pencils and glaze.  The finishing was done with several china paint firings and now....ta da: this little one is ready to wear or to display.

name: The Devil's Playground - Raku Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
You know what they say about an idle mind - not that I have one, but I'm aware of the possibilities! Needless to say, but I'll say it anyway, I try to keep busy...

This stoneware mask sculpture measures 11 1/2" high by 7 1/2" wide by 5" deep.  It has been multifired with layers of engobes, stains and underglaze pencils.  The final firing was a blazing raku fire that seemed SO appropriate!  As you can see, it survived the fire and also survived the journey home from Hungary where I made it.

name: Ms. Conduct - Ceramic Mask Sculpture, Original Wall Art
description:
Every now and then, Ms. Conduct visits me. She's got a bit of an attitude and likes to provoke me with suggestions for what she thinks I ought to be doing. I enjoy her visits but I usually end up getting into trouble and asking her to leave. Maybe you know her too...

This ceramic wall mask measures 6 1/4" high by 5 1/4" wide by 3" deep and is ready to hang in a special place.

name: In a Perfect World - Raku Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
...I'd travel on a butterfly's wings and wear a crown of leaves and flowers...

This small ceramic raku piece measures 3" high by 1 5/8" wide (76 mm x 41 mm). She has been sculpted with stoneware clay and multi-fired with layers of engobes, stains, underglaze pencils and glaze.  The finishing touches were accomplished with china paints, gold lustre and colored pencils.  She would be a "perfect" companion as a pendant or as a display piece.

name: Self Motivated - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant
description:
She's currently running on her own steam.  Let us hope that those mental breezes keep the wheels turning...

This small ceramic mask sculpture (#780 if anyone is keeping track!) measures 3 1/2" high by 1 1/2" wide (90 mm x 39 mm).  The entire piece is made of stoneware clay and fired multiple times with engobes, stains, underglaze pencils and a matte glaze.  Final finishing is china paints, gold lustre and a bit of colored pencil on the roof.  And yes, the pinwheel turns!

name: Every Cloud - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant
description:
Even though it may be difficult to find, the silver lining is always there.  Perhaps a bit of "rain" will help to reveal it...

This small ceramic sculpture measures 2 1/8" high by 2 3/8" wide (54 mm x 60 mm).  The "cloud" has been sculpted with stoneware clay and multi-fired with layers of engobes, stains, underglaze pencils and glaze.  It was finished with a couple more firings with china paints and gold lustre - and, would make a lofty pendant or a lovely display mask.  There is a metal tube affixed to the back of the piece enabling it to be worn as a pendant (with the black leather cord I include).

name: Hot Air - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
It's too bad that all of the hot air in the world can't be harnessed to "power" something useful...

This small, raku mask sculpture measures 3" high by 1 3/4" wide (76 mm x 40 mm).  It is made of stoneware and multi-fired with layers of engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze and china paints.  The final finishing is done with colored pencils and matte varnish.  This little "blow hard" is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

name: Portal - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
When looking into another's eyes, do you see a door, a window, a mirror or all of these things???

This small, original mask sculpture measures 2 1/4" high by 2" wide (57 mm x 50 mm).  It is ready to wear as a pendant (black leather cord included) or to display.

name: Heads are Gonna Roll - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
Look out when she's on the rampage! And, besides the rolling heads, there will surely be some eyes rolling...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 3 1/8" high by 2 5/8" wide (80 mm x 67 mm). If this is worn as a pendant, the heads will be rolling all day long! It may also be displayed in a "statement" kinda place.

name: The Social Chameleon - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
She tries her best to blend in with her surroundings but, most of the time, she just appears to be foolishly disguised...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 2 7/8" high by 1 3/4" wide (73 mm x 44 mm).  It may be worn as a pendant (with the included black leather cord) or displayed.

name: Selective Listening - Raku Wall Mask, Original Mask Art
description:
La. La. La. La. La.  It's such a convenience - listening only to what we'd like to hear.  It may not always be prudent or kind but, often times, it is a survival tactic...

This raku wall mask measures 7 3/4" high by 7 1/4" wide by 2 3/4" deep (19.5 cm x 18.4 cm x 7 cm).  It is "wired" and ready to hang.

name: Becoming Birdgirl - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
She's well on her way to full featherdom! Just a few more and she will join her feathered friends in airborne harmony...

This original ceramic mask sculpture measures 7 1/2" high by 5 3/4" wide by 2" deep and is ready to hang in a special place.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze, multifired, china paint, colored pencils

name: Fellow Travelers - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
As we go on our way, others may join us - either for a few moments or for the long haul. Here's a toast to our fellow travelers and another toast to the journey...

The traveler has been sculpted of stoneware, colored with engobes, stains and underglaze pencils and fired multiple times. After glazing, I used china paints, fired once more and finished with colored pencils, masked and matte varnished. The leaf that she holds is removeable and the entire piece measures 12 1/2" high x 6 3/4" wide x 1 3/4" deep. The mask is ready to hang in a special place

name: Merry Prankster - Raku Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
Here, my coming of age in the 60's is showing. I never was quite that "merry" but many of the concepts intrigued me and have stayed with me over the years. I like to think of the prankster as something that sneeks up from behind the persona and delivers a much needed dose of surprise and wonder. It is not so easy to dismiss the prankster because you never know when he/she will appear. The message is: it's important to keep an open mind.

The size of this original ceramic mask is 9 1/2" high by 4 1/2" wide by 4"deep and it is ready to hang.

name: One Way or Another - Mask Sculpture, Original Ceramic Wall Art
description:
When it's one of "those" days, the battle lines become fuzzy - but one way or another: problems are resolved, things get done and all is right with the world...

This small mask sculpture measures 6 3/4" high by 3 5/8" wide by 1 1/2" deep. The little fools are ready to hang in an oh, so special place.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glazes, multifired, china paints, 24 karat gold lustre, colored pencils

name: Turn the Other Cheek - Raku Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art
description:
If we can turn the other cheek, perhaps the other side can better withstand whatever is being dished out...

This ceramic wall piece measures 11 1/2" high by 7" wide by 4" deep.  The double sided head inside the base turns via the "wings" at the top.  The cheeks on one side are round and the cheeks on the opposite side are square.

name: Be Careful What You Wish For - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
I've done a number of masks using charms, milagros and talismans. I'm ever hopeful that some of these will work their magic and yet, mindful that having a wish or a dream come true is not the be all - end all. Everything is connected and once the wheels are set in motion, there's no going back. That said, I still have lots of wishes!

I had intended to raku this mask, but after all the time I spent drawing the milagros, I was afraid that the crackles would obscure all my hard work. So, in the end, all firing was done in the electric kiln...

The size of this wall mask is approximately 9" high by 4 1/2" wide by 3 1/2" deep and it is ready to grace a special wall.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze, multifired, colored pencils, vinyl coated wire, milagro

name: Making Waves - Small Mask Sculpture, Porcelain Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
She wanted to make a ripple but it turned into a wave...

This small porcelain wall piece has been cast, altered, carved and glazed. I've then used china paints and colored pencils for the finishing. The piece measures 4 3/8" high by 3 1/2" wide by 1 5/8" deep (111 mm x 89 mm x 41mm) and is ready to hang in a special place.

name: Rising Above it All - Ceramic Wall Mask, Original Mask Art, Porcelain and Driftwood Sculpture
description:
No matter what is going on in life, it can be helpful to rise above it all and get a birds-eye view.  Taking the high road can put a lot of things in perspective...

This mask - wall piece was sculpted from porcelain and has a natural driftwood addition (plus 2 small stoneware leaves).  It measures 7 1/4" high by 5" wide by 2" deep and is ready to hang in a special place.

name: Left Behind - Ceramic Wall Mask, Original Mask Art
description:
On one's personal journey, many things get left behind.  Some of these things we no longer need and others have simply been forgotten - but the images stay and often leave a trail.......  

This one of a kind raku and mixed media wall sculpture measures 12" high by 5 1/2" wide by 3 1/4" deep.  The mask and individual "leaves" may be removed from the shadow box but I think that the box enhances and defines the piece.  Either way, it is ready to hang.

name: The Carrot or the Stick - Ceramic Mask Sculpture, Original Mask Art, Ceramic Wall Piece
description:
And so, you may ask (as I do): why must we choose? And is the stick always the poorer choice?...

This ceramic wall piece is one of a kind and measures 7" high by 6" wide by 2" deep - it is ready to hang in a special place.  It has been sculpted of stoneware and colored with engobes, stains and underglaze pencils.  After several firings, I highlighted the piece with colored pencil and a matte varnish.

name: The Meeting - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask
description:
Inspired by Autumn and early Winter,  I imagine all the fallen getting together in conspicuous places for us to enjoy (or rake).  New ideas for the life - leaf metaphor keep on coming and I keep on making them....

I recently spent three months living and working in Hungary and this ceramic wall sculpture was made there during my stay. It measures approximately 5 1/2" high by 3 7/8" wide by 2 1/4" deep (14 cm x 9.8 cm x 5.7 cm) and is ready to hang in a special place.

name: Three Graces - Ceramic Mask Sculpture, Clay Art Wall Mask, Original Art
description:
When "graced" by their presence, Splendor, Mirth and Joy can guide your hand and lift your spirits...

This small ceramic mask was made by yours truly while I was in Hungary.  I didn't finish it there but brought it home to work on a bit more.  The graceful threesome measures 5 1/4" high by 4 1/2" wide by 1 3/4" deep (13.3 cm x 11.5 cm x 4.5 cm) and is ready to hang in a special place.

name: Flying Blind - Ceramic Mask Sculpture, Original Mask Art, Ceramic Wall Art
description:
When I find myself in an unfamiliar situation, I often feel as if I'm flying blind.  The good thing about this is that the more new experiences one has, that much more of the sky opens up - and you're less likely to bump into things....

This one of a kind ceramic wall mask measures 8" high by 4 1/2" wide by 2 3/4" deep (20.3 cm x 11.4 cm x 7 cm).  It was made by yours truly in my studio in sunny St. Helena, California.  The mask is ready to hang in a special place.

name: I Dreamed I Could Fly - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
I've always had flying dreams, but never quite enough of them to suit me: there is nothing quite like the feeling of elation at lift off or the idea that anything is possible. And that is why I gave the piece an expression of apprehension. I chose to depict it in that way to show that the dreamer knows she must awaken and is not quite ready for that to happen. I guess what I'm trying to say is that all good things must end but there will be other nights and new dreams.....

The size of this wall mask is 5 1/2" high by 4 3/4" wide by 3 1/4" deep.  It is ready to hang in a special place.

name: Do You Believe in Magic - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
There is magic all around us - but you must choose to see it.  When your eyes are open to magic, even the smallest things become miraculous.......

This ceramic wall mask measures 6 1/4" high by 5" wide by 2" deep.  It is ready to hang anywhere you'd like a reminder of the magic.

Materials:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze, multifired, colored pencil

name: The Whole World in Her Hands - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art, Original Mask Art
description:
Birdgirl has learned to be grateful for what she has and doesn't worry too much about all that other stuff...

This one of a kind ceramic wall piece measures 7 1/4" high by 4 1/4 " wide by 1 3/4" deep.  It has been sculpted from stoneware clay and multi-fired with layers of engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glazes and china paint.  After all the kiln firing is complete, I highlight some areas with colored pencils and apply a matte varnish to those areas.  Birdgirl is ready to hang in a special place.

name: It's Complicated - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Wall Art
description:
The twists and turns that life sometimes takes can be bewildering.  But if one is able to follow the tangles, a slow unraveling begins and the path straightens...

This small ceramic wall piece measures 5 1/4" high by 3 1/2" wide by 2 " deep (13.3 cm x 8.9 cm x 5.1 cm).  It was conceived, designed and hand made by yours truly and it is ready to hang in a special place.

Materials:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze, multifired, china paints, colored pencils

name: Someone to Watch Over Me - Raku Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Moon Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
We can't always see her but we know she's there.  It's so comforting to know that she is keeping watch and making sure that all is right with the turnings...

This small moon mask sculpture measures 2 1/8" high by 1 7/8" wide.  It has been press molded and altered with stoneware clay using my own original, hand made mold.  The little one has then been bisque fired and multi-fired with engobes, stains and glaze.  The final firing was accomplished using a small raku kiln and finishing was done with colored pencils and matte varnish.  She is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

name: Ivory Tower - Moon Face Pendant, Original Mask Sculpture
description:
From her lofty perch she's got a great view! Her influence is felt far and near, and looking at the bigger picture puts everything in perspective...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 2 1/8" high by 1 3/4" wide (55 mm x 47 mm). She is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, glaze, multifired, raku, colored pencils

name: White Queen - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
Yes, she's a bit frosty and feeling out of place - so she's waiting in the wings for now. It won't be long before she shows herself in all her glory...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 2 5/8" high by 1 5/8" wide (67 mm x 42 mm). The White Queen is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, glazes, multifired, acrylics, colored pencils

name: Have a Heart - Small Ceramic Mask, Original Face Pendant, Wearable Art
description:
...Or take two or three or four and turn them into something useful. After all, a princess can never have too many crowns... 

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 3" high by 1 5/8" wide (76 mm x 41 mm). With her abundance of heart, she is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

MATERIALS

stoneware,engobes,stains,underglaze pencils,glaze,multifired,china paints,24 karat gold lustre,colored pencils

name: A Little Rough Around the Edges - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
In a perfect world, nothing is perfect. I try to remember that as life goes by - but, it is nice to have something out of reach to aim for...

This small ceramic sculpture measures 2 7/8" high by 2 3/8" wide (7.3 cm x 6 cm) and is ready to wear as a pendant or to display.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, matte glaze, multifired, china paint, 24 karat gold lustre, colored pencils

name: Under the Influence - Small Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Original Mask Art
description:
When that inner imp wants to play, I let her. Why not? The worst that could happen would be a bit of foolishness or a sweet dream...

This small ceramic sculpture measures 3 5/8" high by 1 7/8" wide (92 mm x 47 mm). It is ready to "influence" you as a pendant or to display.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze, multifired, china paints, colored pencils

name: A Window in Time - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Art to Wear
description:
Open that window and what do you find? Some will find possibilities, others will find the impossibilities. I like to think of these windows as extra time that cannot be measured...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 2 5/8" high by 1 1/2" wide (66 mm x 38 mm). It is ready to wear as a pendant and as a reminder that time is what you make of it!

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze, multifired, china paints, colored pencils

name: Princess of the Inevitable - Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Mask Pendant, Wearable Art
description:
She knows that her crown is temporary but she collects all those lovely golden leaves. Perhaps she can use them some day...

This small ceramic piece of original art measures 3 7/8" high by 1 5/8" wide (98 mm x 35 mm). "Princess" can be worn as a pendant or displayed in a special place.

MATERIALS:
stoneware, engobes, stains, underglaze pencils, glaze, multifired, china paints, 24 karat gold lustre

name: Ripples in the Stream of Consciousness -  Mask Sculpture, Ceramic Face Pendant, Original Mask Art
description:
Her inner voice is speaking a bit louder these days - and the ripple effect is becoming apparent...

This small ceramic mask sculpture measures 3" high by 1 1/2" wide (76 mm x 38 mm). The noisy one is ready to wear as a pendant (I include a black leather cord) or to display.

MATERIALS:
stoneware,engobes,stains,underglaze pencils,glazes,multifired,china paints,colored pencils
